title: Board Profile Level
body: I'm trying to find a flex team or just people to play with and I can't post or create discussions because my profile is level 3? My summoner level is 30 yet I still can't post on the boards? Can anyone help? Thanks in advanced.

replies.body: No worries! By posting here it forced those levels to sync up with each other, and you're showing up as level 30 now. You should be able to freely post where you need to ^_^!
Nevermind. I figured out how to navigate the web page and I saw other people with similar problems. My bad.
